latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that individual associated with child care service/camp involved in an act detrimental to health and safety
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Camp health program not maintained and/or supervised by physician Health records of campers and staff are not kept and maintained plan is not comprehensive and complete nutrition emergency and first aid plan accident reporting disaster search and rescue child observation food and facility maintenance not included
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations
